name: Special Person
description:
In this game you are being chased by some random guy which is the enemy, you have to run away from them either by holding on the screen or using WASD/Arrow Keys. 

Music: Miss You - ItsIceCreeperPE Dev 

SoundCloud:

Made for GD5 Game Jam #3 lasting 9 days Made in 1.5 days due to school
